artefact: Expenses and benefits: gifts to employees

artefact.alternative_title: Employers' tax and reporting for gifts to employees
artefact.overview: Tax and reporting rules for employers providing gifts to employees
artefact.body:
As an employer providing gifts to your employees, you have certain tax, National Insurance and reporting obligations.

Businesses

There are different rules depending on the type of gift you give. Follow the reporting and payment rules for the specific item.

Self-employed

If you’re self-employed, you don’t have to report or pay tax or National Insurance on personal gifts (eg birthday or wedding presents) that you give to employees.
